capabilities.name: Work Collaboratively
capabilities.description: The role requires working as part of a team to maintain and improve park assets, indicating a foundational level of collaboration.

capabilities.name: Deliver Results
capabilities.description: Field Officers are expected to contribute towards the conservation of the natural environment, requiring a foundational ability to deliver results.

capabilities.name: Plan and Prioritise
capabilities.description: The role involves assisting with a diverse range of activities, necessitating foundational skills in planning and prioritising.

capabilities.name: Display Resilience and Courage
capabilities.description: Given the physically demanding and outdoor nature of the work, foundational resilience and courage are essential.

capabilities.name: Act with Integrity
capabilities.description: Field Officers must adhere to safety and environmental regulations, demonstrating foundational integrity.

capabilities.name: Manage Self
capabilities.description: The ability to work alone or with minimal supervision requires foundational self-management skills.

capabilities.name: Value Diversity
capabilities.description: The commitment to work with Aboriginal communities and manage cultural heritage sites indicates a foundational appreciation for diversity.

capabilities.name: Technology
capabilities.description: Operating and maintaining plant and equipment requires foundational technology skills.

capabilities.name: Project Management
capabilities.description: Participation in fire management activities and maintenance projects requires foundational project management skills.

skills.name: Four-wheel driving
skills.description: Ability to operate four-wheel drive vehicles in various terrains.

skills.name: First Aid
skills.description: Ability to provide first aid assistance in emergency situations.

skills.name: Firefighting
skills.description: Skills in frontline firefighting and support roles.

skills.name: Equipment Operation
skills.description: Operate and maintain a range of plant and equipment.

skills.name: Teamwork
skills.description: Work effectively as part of a team in diverse and dynamic environments.

skills.name: Communication
skills.description: Respond to visitor enquiries and communicate effectively with team members.

generalRole.title: Environmental Field Officer
generalRole.description: This role involves a combination of field operations and environmental science, focusing on the conservation of natural environments, flora, fauna, and cultural heritage through maintenance, compliance, and engagement activities.
